description: The file defines a NotificationProvider class responsible for managing notifications within a Flutter application. It handles loading, adding, marking as read, and dismissing notifications, interfacing with a database service and notifying listeners of state changes.

classes.name: NotificationProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class providing notification management functionalities such as loading, adding, updating read status, dismissing, and fetching notifications by type.

methods.name: loadNotifications
methods.description: Asynchronously loads notifications from the database and updates the internal list.

methods.name: addNotification
methods.description: Adds a new notification to the database and updates the list, inserting it at the beginning for visibility.

methods.name: markAsRead
methods.description: Marks a specific notification as read, updating the database and notification list.

methods.name: dismissNotification
methods.description: Marks a notification as inactive (dismissed) and removes it from the list.

methods.name: get unreadNotifications
methods.description: Returns a list of notifications that are unread and active.

methods.name: getNotificationsByType
methods.description: Filters notifications based on a specified notification type and active status.

methods.name: unreadCount
methods.description: Returns the count of unread notifications.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Internal method to toggle the loading state and notify listeners.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Resets the error message and notifies listeners.
